content: of the chain 3 to complete the round repeat round 3 until you ve reached the desired size copyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn video tutorials available on youtube @juantheyarnaddict addict jtya designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for personal please like/share/subscribe use only it may not be reproduced distributed or sold without the express written permission of the designer finished items made from this pattern may be sold but please credit the designer social media juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juan the yarn addict and friends
